channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16085] Add on metric for failed compactions
item.description: Failing compactions doesn't stop the server so things can go un-noticed for quite a while if there are no metrics.
item.summary: Add on metric for failed compactions

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I can take this. Should be an easy patch.
The attached patch adds a metric incremented when compactions fail due to an exception, and a unit test simulating an exception when checking for a split.
cc: Mikhail Antonov, please review for 1.3.

-1 overall

Yeah, failed compactions is something we're seeing time to time and those are hard to track, patch is small enough I'd say. +1 for 1.3. Thanks Gary Helmling
Updated patch with a fix for TestHeapSize.
